name: Dead Cities, Red Seas & Lost Ghosts
description: went in knowing nothing, did not expect shoegaze but it was a pretty welcome surprise. i thought this one was really good especially on a white lake, near a green mountain where i could feel myself ascending to a higher plane or something. i might relisten at some point when my head doesnt hurt like hell though.

name: Melodrama
description: people in new zealand often try to pretend that the only good nz artist isnt lorde, claiming that 1814 or six60 are somehow on the same level as her. ive listened to six60, ive listened to 1814 (because spotify is shoving them down my throat) and they dont stand a chance, lorde could make dont forget your roots any day of the week but six60 could never make liability. this is easily one of the best synthpop albums of all time. im never going to listen to solar power they cant make me.

name: SABLE,
description: randomly realized this dropped, wasnt even waiting for it and i still get to listen to it before all you guys who are waiting i love living in new zealand so much. anyway this is actually pretty good, id like it to be a bit longer but its an ep so who really cares.

name: MG Ultra
description: this album is like a really long stride in the right direction after uvoid which was dogshit. like its still in the same vein as uvoid creatively but way more refined. still doesnt have the same level of autistic energy as because im young and arrogant. hot lizard is absolutely a banger though. this album felt a little more accessible too? like your grandad would probably still die if you played this for him but it would be only one stroke instead of three.

name: The Machinist - Demo 1
description: ehhh, the vocals are really quiet for some reason (maybe bad recording tools) and the yelling sounded forced

name: From the Circus to the Sea
description: some of the best tiktok music you can find

name: Sometimes I Might Be Introvert
description: this ablum sounds massive. idk music terms or anything but this felt like it was towering over me and just keeps growing somehow.

name: GREY Area
description: a bit of a let down to hear this right after sometimes i might be introvert but its still a great album with some especially great moments like selfish and venom

name: open til midnight
description: pretty classic starmoon, lots of random annoying and often painful sounds that are not needed at all and the actual substance sounds pretty awful too

name: Pent Up Pup - Live @ The Sex Room @ AC '24
description: banished from the sex room

name: Wild God
description: guys can we stop making great albums for like a couple days im having trouble keeping up here <--- this was written during augest when imaginal disk, romance, sky hundred, ultra 85, i lay down my life for you and shadow box dropped

name: Die Lit
description: i guess i just dont get carti, this is his highest rated project and it still only bordered on being good for me. there were some great moments like choppa wont miss but a lot just felt like bloat to me.

name: Fearless Movement
description: imagine getting an andre 3000 feature and its completely instrumental but still goes hard. thats just the kind of album this is and prologue is competing for my favourite song of this year, i wish this was a little shorter though because an hour 30 of jazz was a bit much for me.

name: Swimming
description: mmmm, id like to rate this one higher but there are just a lot of songs that i dont really vibe with but also jet fuel and come back to earth are some of my favourite songs in hiphop, if this only had those two it would probably be an 100 (i mean probably not because that would fuck up the flow but still you get what im saying)

name: Radio Songs
description: an almost offensively boring set of songs, i listened to this because it was from a member of blur but this is just sad

name: Man On The Moon: The End Of Day
description: i fear that im becoming a kid cudi fan. this album is just so catchy and fun and different from a lot of the hiphop i hear usually

name: The Black Saint and the Sinner Lady
description: surely one of my favourite jazz albums of all time, it has a great flow and is just really full. my major problem with this though is the mixing is so fucked like a lot of the 1960s stuff

name: The Magic Show
description: i dont know why people who are bad at making music default to ambient but im sorry an ambient album is not as easily as you think it is

name: A Love Supreme
description: this album is an overrated piece of shit that forced me to switch to mono because its got that annoying ass half in one ear half in the other thing going that gives me a headache. i read a bunch of reviews talking about how cinematic the album was and i just didnt feel that, it felt empty and bored me to death. the 40 points were mercy points.

name: Violator
description: i was sceptical at the start of world in my eyes, i was like 30 seconds in and felt like this album was gonna be dogshit but i was throwing it back by the end of it so i guess i know nothing. that was one of the best synthpop albums ive ever heard in my life, behind maybe just imaginal disk and melodrama (and maybe currents too but im still figuring out how i feel about that one). its like the old ass men in depeche mode were seducing me or something. the best song was either personal jesus or policy of truth and it was crazy when i realised ive heard enjoy the silence a bunch of times and just didnt know it was by these guys. blue dress was by far the worst song and kind of brought this album down a lot. that shit was way too long for its own good and so boring.

name: Crazy Hits
description: mind bending horrors beyond human comprehension

name: Bocanada
description: very fun pop?? dance?? rock?? album. my favourite songs were puente, verbo carne and raiz (especially raiz) and the worst song was y si el muno esta en foco by far. i think it had a bit of a weak second half.

name: The Mouse and the Mask
description: a great project that i somehow didnt know existed until today, this album is great but i feel like if anything doom actually brought it down, the beats were great but doom didn't seem to be on his a game. luckily dooms b game is better than most rappers a game. sofa king and old school rules were my favourite songs, especially sofa king that beat was fire.

name: NO TITLE AS OF 13 FEBRUARY 2024 28,340 DEAD
description: godspeed you black emperor seems to just make the same album over and over again and continue to get glazed for it. its alright but #3 of 2024? i dont think so.

name: Absolute Elsewhere
description: it was pretty great for a death metal album but it still didnt do much for me as most death metal albums do. i should probably stop listening to death metal but symbolic was just so good i have to keep searching for the next banger like that.

name: Twin Fantasy (Face to Face)
description: i dont get the appeal for these guys, maybe its because im not gay and not a furry but this album just never really clicked with me <--- edit 52 -> 54 on a relisten it seems i am still not a furry but slightly more gay

name: Tummyache
description: i might be getting tired of mr kaizo slumber. his songs are starting to all merge into one for me. still thought it was an alright sludge of music.

name: Brat and it's completely different but also still brat
description: yowch, first 136 ratings sitting a 79 (on aoty). probably a bad sign, even though album is worse than the original by a fair bit i still think its a good time and girl, so confusing featuring lorde is way better than the original and one of the best songs this year <--- actually edit i just heard the yung lean ft again and wow that song is dogshit im not even sure this is good <--- another edit, this has grown off me even more, mean girls is awful, so is so i, i might say something stupid and i think about it all the time. <--- last edit, third listen after i saw that somehow this had a critic score of 87 and it was even worse than the first two times. now i am fairly sure i enjoy this less than vultures two.

name: ▓ a desire ▓
description: maybe i just dont get it but the whole first 10 or so minutes felt like just a continuous and painful stream of sounds which was pretty disorienting, if that was the point and if so good job. after that though i started enjoying it a lot more, it started sounding kind of mystical and ethereal which was a nice recovery period for my blown out ear drums though a desire part 1 went on a bit too long. in general i also think this album sounded perhaps a little uncoordinated too, though im no music reviewer so maybe that was me missing the point again lol. i think my favourite songs were untitled-++++++ (or sorrow / intermission) and untitled-+++++++++ (or nothing, version d / forgo), especially untitled-+++++++++ (or nothing, version d / forgo). that song went hard and pulled this thing up like a full point.

name: My Song
description: thanks geordie but this album is just alright. its a nice listen though it just didnt do anything i didnt expect or that interested me enough to move it out of the background.

name: ひまわり画像 (Himawari gazou)
description: after seeing thelemonbreadd's day one review of this i decided to check it out and over the past couple of days ive just let this run in the background while i study and im pretty sure my brain tuned it out after like an hour, i dont know why white noise is rated so highly but alright. the only times i really noticed it was when it got real repetitive during some sections that i just had to skip because i dont want to develop a brain tumour. none of the songs on here are good, just ranging between bad and mid.

name: Speedin' Bullet 2 Heaven
description: this album is absolutely dogshit, i never want to listen to this again and im not adding a single song to my playlist, and yet i still think it was good. this might have been the realist album ever made. i dont know how he did it but instead of making music this man put his soul into this shit and honestly it probably shouldnt even be considered an album because it feels like something very different, this is like a kid cudi horcrux.

name: Kaleidoscope
description: limbo goes so hard it is quite insane. the rest though feels just good, not great.

name: Toy
description: a clearly incomplete album that just got released so they could squeeze as much money as possible out of david. this album is a joke and straight mid.

name: Run the Jewels 2
description: exactly what hardcore hiphop should sound like, sadly though i cant rate this any higher as i dont like hardcore hiphop and some of these tracks werent enjoyable for me.

name: By the Time I Get to Phoenix
description: a very odd and listen that took me a while to get but after quite a few relistens i actually kind of love this album, maybe its stockholm syndrome

name: resERECTION
description: how did he get carried by danny gonzalez bruh shit is ass

name: Selected Ambient Works 85-92
description: it was good but xtal was easily the best song on this so i just spent the rest waiting for another one on that level and it never came

name: Soundtrack from Twin Peaks
description: my favourite ambient album, it just feels like its holding me close or something, this is exactly what an ambient album is meant to be, great work. maybe i have to watch twin peaks at some point

name: Mista Thug Isolation
description: not at all what i expected after volcanic bird enemy and the voiced concern. maybe my expectations were too high but this is just not what i wanted, very disappointed and a pretty alright album at best imo.

name: Wish You Were Here
description: i really liked this album but i think i would have liked it a lot more if there wasnt a 10 hour long build up to every song, also my mum has the vinyl which is pretty cool.

name: NONE OF THIS IS REAL
description: brain tumor music

name: drowning
description: liked it less than phoria, felt the first half was extremely weak but i was pleasantly surprised by the last two especially home which imo is the best song ace of spades has ever made, held back by the vocals. tbh the vocals are easily the worst part of this project and dont mesh well at all with the often good instrumentals.

name: the art of aloneness
description: a nice cozy ambient album, didnt blow me away but was some good background noise to just forget about

name: Velocity : Design : Comfort.
description: dsco and chocolate master were the only good things on this, the rest was just a bunch of glitchy sounds that hurt my head <--- edit dsco cannot carry this changing my score from 5.6 to 3.9

name: CPU Buddha
description: im the consumer wojack i need more digital hardcore in my life please god how did only like three albums come out this year. also the cover is really cool, its like a lake and then you look harder and its a cpu and its like holy shit.

name: Bitches Brew
description: i dont get the hype around this one because this album put me to sleep, even the parts i did like i couldnt put on a playlist or anything because all the songs were like 20 minutes long

name: Death & Rebirth
description: a genuinely good shoegaze ep by askuagender?? my only wish is that it was longer. lies and silence might have been one of my favourite songs this year.

name: I'm Sure
description: another 11 year old me classic, i think this one holds up a little better than mild high club and swinging lynn still goes just as hard as i remember, it just suffers from too much filler.

name: Skiptracing
description: i really liked this like 5 years ago but now ehhhhhh? homage is still a banger and a classic but the rest doesnt hold up as well, especially the entire second half.

name: HARDSTONE PSYCHO
description: my friend told me to listen to this one and holy this shit is ass, even the best song on here (tore up) sucked and by like five songs it the entire album felt like i had collapsed in on itself

name: SOPHIE
description: yowch, thats gonna leave a mark, i prayed that everything on here was going to be as good as reason why and not like the other singles but no :( this ruined my week. i just feel sad now, how could this happen to my beloved goat.

name: 13 Inch Frank Beltrame Italian Stiletto with Bison Horn Grips
description: perhaps too experimental? i liked arp omni and veneficium but the rest was perhaps too grating?? like i could see they were trying to do stuff and really push the boundaries so i couldnt put it much lower because i respect that but it might just not be for me.

name: MAGDALENE
description: some parts of this album put me to sleep and then the song after shocked me awake and it was the best thing ive ever heard, would have been higher if thousand eyes, holy terrain and daybed weren't here.

name: American IV: The Man Comes Around
description: great way to end johnny cash's career (and life ig). hurt is also an all time classic and a cover that is almost better than the original and also completely changes the meaning of the original.

name: HOW TF IS THIS A MIXTAPE?
description: havent heard dababy since like baby on baby and wtf happened to this guy bruh just retire

name: SMOKE IT TO THE BUTT
description: idk why everyone decided to drop on october 4th but this ruined my october 4th. cynthoni keeps doing the same stuff over and over again and if im being real i was already bored with it by pt 1. quitting is hard, not quitting is harder though is really good so that kind of carries.

name: I LAY DOWN MY LIFE FOR YOU
description: actually listened to this on release i just havent added everything ive listened to here yet, anyway this is another peggy classic, some of this shit is straight beautiful and way more mature then i expected for peggy

name: The New Sound
description: GREEP SWEEP GREEP SWEEP JUST LISTENED TO THE LEAK AND HOLY SHIT AOTY IM NOT KIDDING!!!!! okay after chilling out and a few relistens this is even better then i first thought, as if waltz is my favourite song on this, i kind of feel bad for the character after it. <--- edit its a 10 i swear to god

name: Luv(sic) Hexalogy
description: this album needs more luv. this is one of the most beautiful pieces of media i have ever heard. i was crying by pt 3 and i was completely bawling by the finale. i cant even articulate how great this album is, its just one of those things you have to hear for yourself. even the remixes are super high effort and worth your time. i cant believe i just found out about this. i know this is rambly but i just cannot possibly articulate my thoughts on this right now, please just listen to it.

name: pastpresentfuture
description: the only good furry autotuney album if you get me. death at your expense was really good. it is good that this album is short though as it probably couldnt have kept me engaged for more than like 30 minutes.

name: CHIROPTERA MATIERE PREMIERE
description: this felt like one of those one hour of silence interrupted by falling pipes videos

name: The College Dropout
description: better than graduation straight up, every song on here is good and even the skits arent bad. it is kind of sad to click on the people featuring on some of the songs and see their music careers went nowhere though.

name: Graduation
description: the first kanye i ever heard was graduation after he went all nazi and shit and i wasnt disappointed. strong, barry bonds and drunk and hot girls kind of sucked though i dont know, the other songs made up for it easily though. i need bittersweet poetry on spotify.

name: Watch the Throne
description: this album sucks ass, the best song on this is otis and even then that song isnt very good

name: The Life of Pablo
description: I FEEL LIKE PABLO WHEN IM WORKING ON MY SHOES I FEEL LIKE PABLO WHEN I SEE ME ON THE NEWS I FEEL LIKE PABLO WHEN IM WORKING ON MY HOUSE TELL EM THE PARTIES IN HERE WE DONT NEED TO GO OUT!! NO MORE PARTIES IN LA IS THE BEST KANYE SONG OF ALL TIME !!!

name: ye
description: last good album this man made. every song on here slaps and ghost town is one of the best hes ever made straight up. cover also goes hard.

name: Vultures 2
description: yowch, thats gonna leave a mark. this album was so boring it took me four weeks to finish a 49 minute long album. the best songs on here were time moving slow, promotion and 530 and one of them is an old song he released with no changes and the other two i just have to pretend i cant hear the lyrics. reach for the popcorn, oops thats my cock was the best part of the album though.

name: Vultures
description: nazi stuff aside this album just sucked, it had so many misses. i did like stars, burn and back to me though so thats something but i miss when kanye could make music.

name: Intro Bonito
description: sorry kkb this album was kind of bad, there werent many aggressively bad songs (except for cat vs dog) but the only memorable ones were intro bonito and sick beat.

name: Melt My Eyez See Your Future (The Extended Edition)
description: holy shit have sexual intercourse with me denzel curry i love you so much. the extra tracks are all so jazzy and sometimes actually better than the original versions which i already loved (especially melt session #1 cold blooded version, one of the best songs of all time i swear).
oml jid please stop featuring in dogshit youre hurting me

name: 児童カルテ
artist: 神聖かまってちゃん [Shinsei Kamattechan]
description: boring j-pop with a side of a song about a girl killing herself that makes people pretend this album sounds good

name: Are You Experienced
description: i really like this album and manic depression is my favourite jimi hendrix song but holy shit i hate how they made some instruments just play out the left ear in the 60s, my ear is fucked or something so its like physically painful to hear this album without mono. -1 point.
it was certainly noisy though somehow still got a little boring and repetitive even at 24 minutes long.

name: BLAME IT ON BABY
description: this album is like a rollercoaster but like a roller coaster that launches you to your death halfway through. the first seven songs were really good and then they hit me with back to back to back to back to back to back to back dogshit.

name: Baby On Baby
description: goin baby goes hard its really good i swear !! the rest of it sucks ass though so like -4 points.

name: Future Nostalgia
description: if this didnt have the last two tracks it would have been the best dance pop album since michael jackson. tragic that da baby peaked in someone elses album though.

name: Radical Optimism (Extended Versions)
description: i havent listened to the original yet but i heard this was better so i listened to this instead and holy shit this was forgettable, this is such a boring pop album in which dua lipa does nothing interesting or new. i just want another future nostalgia level project please god

name: Nothing Was The Same
description: best album drakes ever made, a few misses for me but it had so much great shit, especially tuscan leather (incredible opener) and pound cake / paris morton music 2 (incredible closer)

name: The Dangers In My Heart (Original TV Anime Soundtrack)
description: trash soundtrack for a trash show. mr kensuke has never made a good soundtrack in his entire life and is the worst part of every show hes in. worst part of silent voice, vorst part of csm and worst part of devilman. stop hiring this man please.

name: The Glow, Pt. 2
description: never caught my attention in its entire one hour, it was just more like background noise or something. i dont know why people love this so much, maybe ill need to relisten at some point.

name: A Promise
description: album was good sometimes and boring other times but apistat commander was so good holy shit, might be a top 50.
i cant wait to tell my friend the song he likes sucks. im going to wait to meet him face to face again to break this to him.

name: All Born Screaming
description: my first time listening to st vincent and it was kind of underwhelming, it was good dont get me wrong but it just didnt stick with me like it did for a lot of other people.

name: Let's Get Retarded
description: whoever removed this from spotify go fuck yourself this goes hard and lets get started is infinitely less funny. i dont even think this is ableist, they arent targetting anyone they are just silly little goobers and eeryone freaked the fuck out.

name: A Moon Shaped Pool
description: had some pretty awesome moments, especially at the start, burn the witch is an almost perfect intro song in my opinion but it was just kind of boring at some points too, especially desert island disk that song was garbage. it also felt samey a lot of the time which didnt help its situation.

name: genre: bradboy
description: not related to this album but like i just saw that video about brad starting youtube again and that man did not look healthy send him back to rehab

name: Forbidden Frequencies
description: please someone tell onision to stop making music he peaked at the banana song

name: アダンの風 (Windswept Adan)
description: majestic, beautiful album. parfum d'etoiles is probably now one of my favourite songs of all time straight up it is beautiful.

name: Ceres & Calypso in the Deep Time
description: incredibly dense album that makes me feel like i really am in some forest or jungle or whatever the place in the cover is. as a side note the cover looks awesome and is the only reason i gave this a chance and thank god i did. best songs on here are fell in love and pangea girls. <---- grew on me even more, this album is real dense

name: To See the Next Part of the Dream
description: good but not parannoul's best by a long shot, the first few were really good especially white ceiling but the rest kind of fell flat for me

name: Pink Tape
description: i cannot tell anyone i fw this

name: Remain in Light
description: i love you the talking heads !! this album is funky and fun. every song on here is a banger. my dad hates this album though for some reason idk bad taste i guess.

name: The Name of This Band Is Talking Heads
description: best version of the best talking heads song (born under punches). even if everything else sucked i would have still given it like a 7, luckily the rest of the songs are as good if not better than their album versions. except for this psycho killer version it kind of sucked imo.

name: Stop Making Sense
description: very good but kind of overrated imo

name: stop loving me!
description: why do i keep listening to tuv's music i have to stop. anyways this was just worse than the first one.

name: Toxicity
description: i dont know who the system of a down singer is but i love him, system of a downs albums sound so unique to other metal records ive heard and i love it.

name: LONG SEASON
description: could have been a 90 if part 3 was changed, it was in the live album though so thats the best version of this song. this is still incredible though.

name: 宇宙 日本 世田谷 (Uchū Nippon Setagaya)
description: my second favourite fishmans thing and feels so different from the rest of their stuff but still sounds like them. i cant explain it but i had a massive smile the entire time.

name: 空中キャンプ (Kūchū Camp)
description: less dreamy then the other projects of theirs ive heard but it makes up for it but just being really fun

name: 98.12.28 男達の別れ (98.12.28 Otokotachi no wakare)
description: the greatest live album of all time. it solves any issues ive had with their other songs. particularly ゆらめき IN THE AIR and LONG SEASON turn from extremely good to masterpieces. i genuinely cannot believe this was performed live. some of the most beautiful, charming and almost mystical sounding music ive ever heard. i swear to god after this album ended i started hyperventilating and shit because i had my breath held the whole time.

name: The Stranger
description: its seems such a waste of time, if thats what its all about. mama if thats movin up, then im moving out !! peak

name: The Turning Wheel
description: might need to listen to this again at some point but i just wasnt feeling it at the time

name: HARAM
description: sorry armand this sounds like shit, fire cover though <--- this was hyperbolic for any stupid people

name: Funeral
description: its insane this album got made in 2004. it still sounds so fresh, its like 10 years ahead of its time at least. the cover not making a square doesnt please me though.

name: Ghoosteen
artist: Nick Cave and the Bad Seeds
description: all my opinions have been formed by anthony fantano. he ruined this for me.

name: The Very Best of Judy Collins
description: best version of amazing grace out there !! the rest is a vibe too.

name: Pointy Heights
description: ehhh, its alright, just kind of forgettable. 100 bux and war go hard though.

name: Slumdog Millionaire (Music From The Motion Picture)
description: thank you my one true love, mausam & escape

name: Reeds and Seeds
description: shockingly good for a pvz jazz album made by some guy on youtube. some songs were forgettable but loonboon went hard so we all good.

name: El Jardín de los Presentes
description: me encanta el jardín de los presentes !!

name: Electric Landlady
description: i make love to you in your sleep and lord knows you felt no pain? ok jimi

name: Ta-Dah
description: a fun album but not really that memorable idk. i cant decide is pretty good though.

name: We Buy Diabetic Test Strips + Doves
description: godspeed you black emperor if they made good music

name: VOLCANIC BIRD ENEMY AND THE VOICED CONCERN
description: 8.6 > 8.8 > 9.2 > 9.6 > 10 this album grew on me like crazy tonight i decided to give it another relisten and spent like a fully hour crying. i know its a little cliche to say but this album feels like how it feels to be in an insane dream, where everything feels normal and you only realise how off everything was when you wake up. incredible.

name: Master of Puppets
description: this album was great but i feel like it wasnt as insane and over the top as expected. honestly kind of a chill metal album idk.

name: Discovery
description: what the fuck is french house and why is it so fire

name: Timely!!
description: this was my first time listening to a j-pop album so i decided to just pick the highest rated one and i was not disappointed. this album was just so charming and fun even if i cant understand a word she is saying. i dont know what city pop is but this is probably the best of that too.

name: Red
description: sorry mr crimson but this album is just kind of boring and providence is just straight up bad.

name: Symbolic
description: best metal album ive ever heard. insane riffs, insane vocals and the perfect energy that you should have in a metal album, this entire album sounds so chaotic and it is just something you have to experience yourself. go listen to this right now !!

name: Garbage
description: not garbage, just mediocre (badum tss) (still got it). every song just made me feel nothing.

name: Led Zeppelin IV
description: very good album but i had a mix up on spotify and accidentally listened to symbolic by death the first time and didnt realise because this was my first time hearing a led zeppelin album.

name: Ghosteen
artist: Nick Cave and the Bad Seeds
description: it was alright, not worth the 93 critic score though. the mixing was kind of fucked at some points and it just felt tedious a lot of the time.

name: You Won't Get What You Want
description: sorry anthony fantano but this is not an 100. still was a pretty fire rock album and i had a good time with it but like cmon man. maybe its just too deep for me.

name: Beloved! Paradise! Jazz?!
description: thought he had a paw on the cover and i was bout to listen to some furry jazz rap. very disappointed it wasnt.

name: The Melodic Blue
description: the features were carrying this album so hard (except for 16 that shit was fire)

name: MTV Unplugged in New York
description: my favourite performance from nirvana, very strong album with the best variant of every song they perform except for the man who sold the world and i will die on that hill. kurts range musically is crazy and fun fact apparently someone bought the cardigan he was wearing for $334k ??

name: Live At Folsom Prison
description: really overrated? maybe its because i just dont like country but this album was just really boring for me and i was not having a good time with mr cash

name: ear candy
description: youtubers need to stop making music holy shit

name: Zerstör Dich Selbst
description: not very good. i dont know how this got a 70 on aoty but harsh noise isnt my favourite genre despite popular belief.

name: The Mollusk
description: another weird as album that somehow achieves its purpose i assume of making me an ocean man perfectly. ive never really heard an album like this before and every song is really unique and i like it a lot, its like a rollercoster ride but instead of ups and downs it just keeps going up until we reach the sun and die. as a side note buckingham green is way better than ocean man i swear.

name: Slipknot
description: insane ass album with an intense but also kind of silly fun energy to it which i cant say i saw coming. my dad didnt enjoy this one though.

name: Soundtracks for the Blind
description: overrated piece of dog shit. the first three songs were the best in the entire album and only song i enjoyed on copper was the sound. i cant believe i wasted 2 hours of my life listening to this with the assumption that it would get better and it being called a masterpiece would start to make sense. i couldnt even tell this albums songs apart because they all sound the same and the whispering vocals made me feel like i was going senile.

name: System of a Down
description: my girl, you know, she lashes out at me sometimes and i just fucking kick her !! bars.

name: Plants Vs. Zombies Original Video Game Soundtrack
description: why was this flash games soundtrack so good wtf

name: Ocean Eyes
description: its fine but forgettable. nothing stood out as bad but same goes for nothing being good.

name: Loss of Life
description: all over the place but it has a lot of great stuff, dancing in babylon is magestic and loss of life might be my favourite or at least one of my favourites this year

name: MGMT
description: first half was good, second half wasnt, probably evens out to like a 6

name: Congratulations
description: living tombstone ass cover

name: Little Dark Age
description: random nazis online have never been the same since this dropped

name: Gemini Rights
description: smooth. i get why tiktok likes this stuff.

name: Choose Your Weapon
description: best part of the album is the cover. i dont like jazz either so that doesnt help.

name: TRANS TRAP
description: lucky this is only 10 minutes because if it was like 30 this would be like 2

name: The Forever Story (Extended Version)
description: this my son, he came from these nuts. this negro came back from school all tatted up the sistine chapel talkin bout how he aint playin football no more.

name: The Blackfayce - EP
description: i still think that hes doing this ironically but hes fallen so far its just kind of sad

name: Ultra 85
description: just looked out the window and saw a pig flying wtf

name: Young Alpha 5
description: young alpha couldnt even get a girl on the cover this shit is ass

name: Mane I Can't
description: sometimes you dig too deep

name: Mane I Can't
description: sometimes you dig too deep

name: Acid Rap
description: collapses halfway through but the start and the end are pretty great and just a fun time
its fine, didnt make me feel anything in specific it was just an alright time

name: Dream Vessel
description: guess what this has in common with mommycore

name: Coloring Book
description: charming and infectious. unlike acid rap it doesnt collapse halfway through but it doesnt reach as high highs as acid rap. still puts a smile on my face though.

name: to whoever wants to hear
description: yung gravy made a song better this is not a good sign

name: Hazbin Hotel (Original Soundtrack)
description: its so cringy i cant take it. if i get to hell and its made by vivziepop im gonna be so pissed.

name: Bird's Eye
description: it was a good listen, kept me interested and was pretty chill but didnt really leave me wanting more

name: After the Magic
description: decided to give this a listen after seeing anthony fantano (my biggest opp) give sky hundred a 6. pretty fire, still prefer sky hundred though !!

name: RECKLESS
description: the good: great beats, the bad: everything else

name: Charm
description: i get while people like it but also it bored me to death so i dont care. still i cant say its bad as it clearly just isnt for me

name: Yes, Virginia...
description: made me cringe, make this all in a language i dont understand and ill like it more

name: The Black Parade
description: might be because i listened to this right after tcfsr but it as just too emo for me to really think of it as more then just good

name: Popular Monster
description: you know those videos of two squares and the smaller one is knocking against the wall and the heavier one and its counting how many hits until the heavy one gets knocked away? yeah

name: Have a Nice Life
description: i think i might like shoegaze (wtf) ?? ive never been depressed (im somewhat of a mental health massiah) so its not like i relate too heavily to whats being said here, but i can hear the emotion in this and its mad beautiful tbh (and just between me and you, i cried on there is no food). there are also lots of bangers in this album too, like half of this album is going on my regular listening playlist and theres nothing anyone can do to stop me from playing them when i get the aux.

name: 50 Cent
description: pretty mixed bag but it was incredible more then it was awful. could do with like 20 less minutes too.

name: Hex Dealer
description: i love this guys voice so much, very good addition to my favourite genre, terminally onlinecore

name: Desert of Doom
description: very amateurish sounding (idk how to describe it)

name: Under Pressure
description: not good, boring a lot of the time but never too bad that it was funny, just slightly above mid.

name: Kurzgesagt, Vol. 8 (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)
description: its good studying music istg

name: Steroids (Crouching Tiger Hidden Gabber Megamix)
description: 20 minutes of pure autism holy shit

name: PRODUCT
description: BIPP carries so hard

name: Fine Line
description: imagine salt on white rice (it still tastes kinda good though i know this is the whitest thing ive ever said just hear me out)

name: Bump This
description: im danny gonzalez's biggest fan but this is kind of ass. bad boy is pretty alright but everything else just isnt funny idk.

name: Jenny Death
description: my favourite half of the powers that b. no back cover for this one as im pretty sure it never got a physical release?

name: How Are We Feeling Today?
description: was wondering on gross technique how they would keep up this energy then i heard gengar ectasy and have been twitching on the floor ever since

name: How Are We Feeling Today?
description: was wondering on gross technique how they would keep up this energy then i heard gengar ectasy and have been twitching on the floor ever since

name: Valedictorian
description: dont really listen to yeat or mabu so this just sounds uninspired to me. it does not spark joy. good thing its only 20 minutes because i might have gone insane.

name: Purple Rain
description: great cover. i had a real good time with purple rain even i dont think its top 25. i watched the movie after though and that was ass.

name: Vespertine
description: my dad complaining the whole time probably didnt help but im yet to understand why this is one of the top 10 highest rated of all times, still thought it was great though.

name: So
description: a very groovy album and the kate bush feature was sick, sledgehammer has been on repeat ever since listening.

name: Imaginal Disk
description: woke up, got some coffee, opened up aoty, looked at the discover page and spat that shit out. sorry peggy i cant listen to you im too busy flying she looked at me had my arms spread 400ft above ground and that was just the first song holy shit (best song is tunnel vision btw). (no back cover yet because it just came out).

name: Romance
description: a great album that missed being incredible by having bug, motorcycle boy and sundowner, all of its worst songs in a row

name: Exmili-Toby
description: kyle rittenhouse (the song) was kind of fire im not even gonna lie

name: Hounds of Love
description: overrated but still good, lots of great songs in this but also a few which were boring

name: CAROUSEL FROM HELL
description: a bit undercooked and after hearing goatmeal i kind of expected more but an overall fun time

name: Reality
description: weird ass cover for a very mid album. very forgettable with not a single interesting song.

name: shadowbox
description: typa shit to make you never want to listen to mavi again it was just so soul crushingly good (no vinyl out yet so i just used a random mavi image as the back cover).

name: LEGO® White Noise
description: this was anything but a soothing experience. it made my ears feel like they were being tickled from the inside.

name: Our Beautiful Dark Twisted Subreddit
description: what i expected from r/kanye. looks like this was fun to make but that didnt translate to being fun to listen to.

name: MOMMYCORE
artist: Blushy Buttercup, Princess Bunny, DJ PUPPYBUTT & Starmoon
description: imagine going to heaven and then having to explain to your ancestors why you listened to mommycore

name: Dream Vessel
description: furry music or not this just sucks ass

name: TOTEP
description: a warning shot before their hood classic tine 'n' place

name: Civilisation II
description: we are so back

name: Civilisation I
description: when the fires come had no reason to go that hard wtf. aside from that probably sadly my least favourite kkb project so far. not to say its bad but it just kinda missed the mark for me with only one song i could say i want to add to my playlist and the rest being just good, not great.

name: death of a rabbit
description: wayy too much ambition compared to their actual ability

name: Sky Hundred
description: the light at the end of the tunnel was a flashbang. what the fuck.

name: Only God Was Above Us
description: vampire weekend got me wanting to wear a beanie. ever song slaps and i thoroughly enjoyed this on first listen and second and third. probably on like 10th by now at least.

name: Lift Your Skinny Fists Like Antennas to Heaven
description: yeah i really like sitting in complete silence for half of an album. i know this is meant to be more an art peice and i appreciate that but i still dont really care, i like albums that people play and you actually hear it, you know, driving a car hearing another car playing it, you know, go to the barbershop and you hear them playing it, you know, turn the radio on and you hear them playing it, you know, its playing everywhere, its called great music, its called albums that you actually hear the songs, not no mysterious shit and you never hear it.

name: Cyberia Lyr1+2=3
description: sewerslvt out here dropping the most mid breakcore album on earth !!

name: PARTYNEXTDOOR 4 (P4)
description: if this guy has ghostwriters, fire them. if not, please hire some.

name: Djesse (Vol. 4)
description: should have just made a really good single instead of this boring ass album

name: dys
description: i can see potential but that pontential wasnt really taken advantage of until phoria. i also had a small text conversation with ms spades. seems pretty cool.

name: Hobo Johnson Alienates His Fanbase
description: this sounds like shit

name: War Ina Babylon
description: reggae classic that not enough people talk about. bob marley who?

name: Weezer (White Album)
description: whitest thing on earth

name: Nevermind
description: a hot take but this is not a top 100 of all time its very good and i think i have an idea of why people love it so much but it just doesnt do as much for me as i thought it would and it also peaked on track #1.

name: 10,000 gecs
description: just as fun as the last album and sounds slightly more refined idk? it didnt have a song as good as money machine but it was a lot more consistently good.

name: 1000 gecs
description: its pretty good and just a really fun time.

name: Hellfire
description: did not love this as muchas i expected. i thought it was good and almost very good but i cant really see where the massive amount of hype behind black midi comes from.

name: SCRAPYARD III
description: way better then scrapyard imo. this 9 minutes had me levitating. it was a very spiritual experience and easier is crazy.

name: Some Rap Songs
description: very raw. very experimental. very good. shattered dreams is one of my favourite opening tracks to like almost album.

name: Frailty
description: show this to a victorian child he'll fucking die epic prank. this album is all over the place but it feels so right.

name: OIL OF EVERY PEARL'S UN-INSIDES
description: i just cant see how you can be transphobic when this exists? like what can you really do at this point.

name: Section.80
description: hiiiipower is my most listened to kendrick song. thats all i have to say.

name: Yelwah Eoj Yelwah Eoj
description: what the fuck is this joe go back to grooming minors. i know why he reversed it, copyright and shit, but like did he really think anyone who isnt a tallyhall superfan would put in the effort to download the mp3 and manually reverse this shit. anyways i listened to some shitty bootleg soundcloud version of this before realising he made an unreversed version called joe hawley. jokes on me i guess.

name: Pet Sounds
description: so charming, so creative, every singe song is great no matter how many people say some havent aged well. this is peak beach boys before they became drug addicts or whatever the fuck.

name: Alone In A Crowd
description: i think a fair bit of effort was put into this?? its almost alright, im feeling a strong 5 on the next album.

name: Weezer (Blue Album)
description: guy on far left look like a testicle am i right lads or am i right lads?

name: SYRE
description: a bit overhated imo. the first 4 songs are straight fire, ninety slaps and most of the other songs are pretty alright. the last one was kind of ass but still listenable. i also dont know why people are criticising jaden for being egotistical when thats like 90% of rap music.

name: Sewerslvt Presents: Cynthoni, Pt. 2
description: admittedly better then the first one, feels a lot more complete and clean. its still boring though and idk how im seeing some people saying machine girl needs to take pointers from this. dumbasses.

name: Sewerslvt Presents: Cynthoni, Pt. 1
description: big downgrade from their last album and idk how thats possible. its just so boring and making use of all the weakest aspects of sewerslvt (except for putting horrific deaths in their songs).

name: Se Bueno
description: a good listen. ive seen this being called a sewerslvt clone just because its breakcore ig but this is better then anything sewerslvt has ever made.

name: this EP will definitely outsell ice spice and riskr
description: a better then expected shitpost album by amyreal. my favourite song was Gambling Addictions Should Be Normalized And Encouraged.

name: Heathen
description: a pretty mid album from bowie, had a couple bangers like heathen and slip away but that was it. at least it wasnt as bad as some of the 1980s stuff.

name: Fashion Week
description: death grips' worst album and it wasnt even awful just empty without mc rides vocals

name: Liberty
description: hololive makes another of the most forgettable j-rock albums ive ever heard. if i didnt note down that id listened to this i probably would have forgotten.

name: Cowboy Tears
description: big downgrade from his last album. this just felt boring and playing it too safe.

name: This Is How Tomorrow Moves'
description: bababooey

name: Clandestino'
description: im the king of the bongo, baby. my mothers' favourite album making it the soundtrack to my childhood. i like it a lot, every song is insanely catchy and fun. one of the most fun albums ive ever heard and still manages to fit some meaning in. the 78 on aoty doesnt do it service !!

name: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
description: the highs are highs and the lows arent too bad. many men and p.i.m.p are hood classics too and help the situation.

name: Horses
description: i didnt fw this one as much as expected. it was just kind of boring idk, its still fine but nothing too special imo.

name: The Black Album
description: he sampled chase the devil so it got instant 8!! even the interlude was so fire !!

name: Yeezus
description: closest kanye has gotten to being noided and it was beautiful

name: Maigre
description: that screaming sounded real. maybe we should check in on these guys or something idk.

name: Spirit Phone
description: tally hall and will wood want to be him so bad. hes to theatrecore what kendrick lamar is to hiphop. this man made an almost 2 hour long album and ive listened to it like 20 times.

name: CALL ME IF YOU GET LOST
description: tyler came back with his most hiphop album in ages just to flex or something idk. hes my goat tho.

name: Inside (The Songs)
description: i guess i have a little theatre kid left in me

name: Donda
description: this album has grown on me a fair bet. still feel like its too long but it has lots of fire songs and this album was just really memorable for some reason. maybe because everything after it was shit. come to life was also so fucking sad.

name: if you're out there i miss you ｡ﾟ･ (>_<) ･ﾟ｡
description: falls over the moment it gets past the start line and doesnt recover.

name: Dawn FM
description: very solid record, kept me entertained the whole time. i also like the tyler feature.

name: Serotonin Dreams
description: this album is so cringy i just wanna curl up into a ball and hide. this is what 13 year olds with crying bart simpson pfps listen to.

name: In case I make It,
description: i like a bit of it but why the fuck is will trying so hard in every album just stop playing every sound at the same time jesus christ. cringyish lyrics dont help the situation.

name: Time 'n' Place
description: the death grips --> kkb pipeline is so real its crazy wtf. big step up lyrically from bonito generation and a different but just as enjoyable energy.

name: Bonito Generation
description: thank you sarah bonito for ruining my life. the life grips jokes were real.

name: DAMN.
description: not as consistent as the rest of kendricks stuff but its full of bangers and a realy great listen

name: Playdough Cooked in Tea
description: i was under the impression jokes were meant to be funny

name: LP! (Offline)
description: had to go on an ebay scavanger hunt for that low quality picture of the back cover

name: we had good times together, don't forget that
description: sewersvlt's magnum opus and its still mid !! i suggest you kill yourself! !

name: Skitzofrenia Simulation
description: good title, dumpster fire album. sewersvlt is such an edgelord god damn

name: The World Is Fvcked
description: sewerslvt is back to making stinky poo poo music. so god damn boring.

name: Drowning In The Sewer
description: sewerslvt has evolved from being shit to fine !! great stuff !!

name: Drowning In The Sewer
description: devolution, no clue why people like this so much but it sounds like shit im not even gonna lie and nothingness proves sewerslvt is still completely insane (in a bad way).

name: Starving Slvts Always Get Their Fix
description: makes my ears bleed more then the last album but also feels like theres actually something going on unlike the last album

name: Interdimensional Snuff Films
description: sewerslvt slowly improves, still hasnt made an album that didnt make my ears want to throw themselves into a bathtub with a toaster, which i guess is what the cover was symbolising.

name: It Just Gets Worse
description: i wouldnt go as far as to say worse because you cant go below 0 but this is still ass !!

name: Don't Be Afraid of Dying
description: an album so catastrophically bad in execution it forced me to retroactively bump up every other album ive rated 0 by 5 because they truly cannot compare (im not uploading these in order trust the process i just havent put in any of the other things i thought were 0s so far)

name: SCRAPYARD
description: overrated imo. gave me a crazy ass cover and all caps song names and it did not deliver the insane autism expected.

name: Earthling
description: i might just be a david bowie meatrider but this album is really underrated. not a single miss and half of it was peak bowie, little wonder !! battle for britain?!! siven years in tibet?! im afraid of americans😨😨 !?!!

name: Late to Work
description: this album is shit but look at that fucking cover LMAOOOO WHAT DID JOLLIBEE DO??!?!

name: Ménage à Trois: Sextape Vol. 1, 2, 3
description: so unbelievably boring, i genuinely cannot believe i wasted so much on this not a single stad out song. this guy is also so horny its insane.

name: Ugly is Beautiful
description: good production (probably because he had like 500 people working on this) but feels soulless (probably because he had like 500 people working on this)

name: Mouth Moods
description: meme album but its bars im not even gonna lie. its charming and creative and i like it quite a lot.

name: SCARING THE HOES: DLC PACK
description: its like the album, but more of it !! hermanos is also genuinely one of my favourite peggy songs, i cant explain it.

name: Yandhi
description: shit was majestic what did we do to end up getting the bad ending

name: phoria
description: big improvements from dys, then is definitly darker and the lyrics pretty hard even for someone who doesnt really relate to ace of spades' struggle. doesnt mean i thought it was great though. a few songs feel needlessly long and it doesnt help that a lot of this album felt repetitive.

name: HIT ME HARD AND SOFT
description: it had a lot of bops but its so corny some songs were genuinely difficult to sit through. honestly i was so ready to stop listening at skinny it almost broke me and sunk cost is the only thing that pulled me through the diner.

name: Station to Station
description: mf made one of my favourite albums white he was fucked up out of his mind, maybe this whole cocaine thing isnt so bad after all.

name: Illinois
description: folk isnt usually a genre im into but it is when its sufjan making it ig. the first song on here was gorgeous and blew my expectations out of the water, then that happened again 22 more times.

name: Late Registration
description: second best kanye record, filled with so many replayable bangers its actually insane. probably my most replayed record, the skits werent even that bad either. (sorry for the poorly cropped back cover its a pain in the ass to find a high quality front and back that are the same size).

name: Exmilitary
description: my second favourite death grips thing. originally didnt put it here because its technically a mixtape but i dont care anymore this is the greatest mixtape ever made i pray every single day for it to come onto spotify. the kero kero bonito and tobuscus mashups are fire too im not even kidding.

name: Chaser
description: femtanyl's first album and its fire. i originally gave this an 8.5 because i thought it was really good but not a masterpiece but i slowly just kept listening to it over and over and now even though i only have 19 femtanyl songs in my playlist of 1000 femtanyl is my top artist.

name: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
description: the best beatles album abbey road put me to sleep but this is my shit, from start to end not a single miss the people on aoty are lying to you when they say this isnt as good as abbey road and revolver. the cover is also fire, idk why they cropped ghandi out though. <--- went from 96 > 83 ive grown to dispise the mixing in this album

name: To Pimp a Butterfly
description: iconic album and probably one of the best hiphop albums ever made. the cover is also sick. this is really short because honestly im not smart enough, american enough or black enough to correctly talk about it but all i can say is that your racist uncle wont be racist if you make him listen to this.

name: Igor
description: my favourite tyler the creator album and probably my favourite album ever. tells a story as well as having only bangers. the vinyl even has a secret song (boyfriend) which is fire and the cover really stands out, listen to it now.

name: The Money Store
description: this album got me drenched in sweat by the end of it. its like a gateway drug to more experiemental hiphop aswell as a gateway into crack. idk if id say you should buy this as the bdsm type cover probably wont leave a good impression on your friends and family.

name: My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy
description: best nicki minaj verse ever on monster, best rick ross verse on devil in a new dress and runaway is one of my favourite songs ever. listen to it if you havent yet. the album art is also iconic and recognisable so its pretty cool to have.

name: Ziggy Stardust and the Spider From Mars
description: basically perfect album in my mind. not a single miss, five years is a perfect start and rock 'n' roll suicide is the perfect final song. the cover is icon too, also undeniable proof david bowies from the future he predicted kanye west!!
